pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This video is a scenery shot. It captures a massive, dark, and ominous storm cloud formation looming over a flat, grassy landscape. A greenish hue, often indicative of severe weather like hail, is visible on the left side of the storm system.
